Question
========
A sociologist determines that out of 200 couples that had children within 2 years of getting married, 80 were divorced after 5 years. If p is the population proportion of couples that had children within 2 years of getting married and were divorced after 5 years, what is the 90% confidence interval for this proportion?

Answerlist
----------
* 0.400 ± 0.035
* 0.400 ± 0.057
* 0.400 ± 0.067
* 0.400 ± 0.088


Solution
========
The correct answer is 0.400 ± 0.057
